mapper.select: SELECT kind , prod_nm , LISTAGG(prod_dtl_nm,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY kind, prod_nm, prod_dtl_nm) AS prod_dtl_nm , client FROM HANADMIN.PRDT_INFO GROUP BY kind, prod_nm, client
mapper.update: /* PrdtInOutMapper.mergePrdtStock */ MERGE INTO hanadmin.prdt_stock S USING DUAL ON (S.PROD_ID = #{PROD_ID}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.COUNT = S.COUNT - (#{BOX_PER_COUNT}*-1) , S.BOX_COUNT = S.BOX_COUNT - (#{BOX_COUNT}*-1) , S.UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE , S.UPDATE_USER = #{UPDATE_USER} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (S.INOUT_DATE , S.KIND, S.PRODUCT_GUBUN, S.PROD_ID, S.COUNT, S.BOX_COUNT, S.PRICE, S.CREATE_DATE, S.CREATE_USER) VALUES (#{INOUT_DATE}, #{KIND}, #{PRODUCT_GUBUN}, #{PROD_ID}, #{BOX_PER_COUNT}, #{BOX_COUNT}, #{PRICE}, SYSDATE, #{CREATE_USER})
